title: Emerald and Diamond Cascading Haaram Necklace
materials: cushion-cut emerald. Adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds. Diamonds are of VS clarity and G color.
features: This modern haaram features a cascading design, with rows of diamond-studded oval shapes. The focal point is a vibrant green emerald stone. The design is flexible to provide greater comfort and fit around the neck. This piece uses a prong setting.
occasions: weddings and special occasions. It's also a great choice for Seemantham
Half-Saree Functions or any other special occasion where an emerald necklace is desired.
description: A contemporary interpretation of the traditional haaram, blending modern design with the timeless elegance of emeralds and diamonds. High-quality craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. The emerald gemstone symbolizes growth, renewal, and prosperity, adding a touch of traditional significance.
